title: Blended Learning Program for Pre-Service Physics Undergraduates

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational knowledge of physics
context.additional_context: Physics foundational competency enhancement program for in-service professionals, offering a blended learning environment combining mobile devices and offline classes

learning_goals: Learners can understand and explain foundational physics concepts (mechanics, electromagnetism, thermodynamics, etc.) via MOOCs
Learners enhance problem-solving skills using technology-based feedback tools (clickers, etc.) in face-to-face instruction
Learners analyze physics principles applicable to real-world work environments through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
